title: Wurst Bar
typeOfFood: American, Beer/Wine, Delivery, Take-out, German, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Bratwurst and burger bar that's primary meat-based, so be warned. Offers a few vegetarian sandwiches, brats, and appetizers. Vegan suitable include a spicy seitan wurst, chick-fu sandwich, vegan tot appetizer, and an ice cream. Let the staff know you're vegan, and your entree will come on a butter-less pretzel roll. Extensive drink menu with nightly specials.
